short_summary: Integrated FTIR and QCL imaging microscopy and spectrometry system
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 26 January 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The National Research Council (NRC) Canada has a requirement for an integrated Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) and quantum cascade laser (QCL) imaging microscopy and spectrometry system. Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that its product/equipment/system (as appropriate) meets the specifications listed in the ACAN document.
